觬字的基本解释

觬
ní
角弯曲不正。

觬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ní］
［《廣韻》五稽切，平齊，疑。］
［《廣韻》研啓切，上薺，疑。］
(1)角不正貌。
(2)用作地名。觬是，汉县名。见《汉书·地理志上》。

觬字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1143第17
【廣韻】五稽切【集韻】硏奚切，?音倪。【說文】角觬曲也。【廣韻】角不正貌。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】西河郡有觬氏縣。　又【唐韻】硏啓切【集韻】吾禮切，?倪上聲。義同。

觬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
觬字的起名意思

暂无。

Covet
Basic explanation of words
Covet
ní
The corners are not bent correctly.
Covet
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ní]
["Guangyun" five pieces of cut, even, suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" research and cutting, on water chestnut, suspicious. ]
(1) The angle is not upright.
(2) Used as a place name. It is the name of Han County. See "Book of Han Geography".
Covet
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觬; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1143 Page 17
【Guangyun】Five Jiqie 【Jiyun】Rhyme cut,? Yin Ni. [Said the text] also horned song. [Guang Yun] The angle is not upright.　Also the county name. [Pre-Han · Geography] Xihe County has Qiushi County.　[Tang Yun] Qiao Qiqi [Ji Yun] I am courteous and cut,? Ni Shangsheng. The same meaning.
